title: one public road, than watchman’s booth of 3sq
clause_text: one public road, than watchman’s booth of 3sq.m on each access road may be allowed, provided it is not highway. Watchman booth should be located in such way that it should not affect maneuvering of Fire Tender.
section: Other features permitted in open space:
